tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE FieldTrials (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  experiment_date DATE,
  location VARCHAR(50),
  crop_type VARCHAR(50),
  yield INT
);

CREATE TABLE FieldTrials (
  trial_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  experiment_name VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  results TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ResearchExperiments (
  experiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  researcher_name VARCHAR(255),
  research_topic VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  findings TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ExperimentalData (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trial_id INT REFERENCES FieldTrials(trial_id),
  sensor_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  measurement_value FLOAT NOT NULL,
  measurement_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE field_trials (
    trial_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trial_date DATE,
    experiment_name VARCHAR(255),
    researcher_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE experimental_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trial_id INT,
    data_type VARCHAR(255),
    data_value FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (trial_id) REFERENCES field_trials(trial_id)
);

CREATE TABLE research_results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    data_id INT,
    result_description TEXT,
    result_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (data_id) REFERENCES experimental_data(data_id)
);

CREATE TABLE decision_making (
    decision_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    result_id INT,
    decision_description TEXT,
    decision_date DATE,
    decision_maker VARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY (result_id) REFERENCES research_results(result_id)
);

CREATE TABLE FieldTrials (
  field_trial_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location TEXT,
  crop_type TEXT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Measurements (
  measurement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  field_trial_id INT,
  measure_date DATE,
  measure_type TEXT,
  value FLOAT,
  FOREIGN KEY (field_trial_id) REFERENCES FieldTrials(field_trial_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Experiments (
  experiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  researcher_id INT,
  experiment_date DATE,
  description TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES Researchers(researcher_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Results (
  result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  experiment_id INT,
  measurement_id INT,
  result_value FLOAT,
  FOREIGN KEY (experiment_id) REFERENCES Experiments(experiment_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (measurement_id) REFERENCES Measurements(measurement_id)
);
